casebody.data:
BENNETT.
v.
BENNETT. No. 37A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 15, 2007. J. Donald Cowan, Jr., Angela L. Little, Greensboro, for Lee Ann P. Bennett. Stephen E. Robertson, Greensboro, for Gregory Bennett. Hannah G. Styron, Raleigh, for NCADA, Amicus. Burton Craige, Raleigh, for NCATL. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of February 2007 by N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys and N.C. Academy of Trial Lawyers for leave to file Amici Curiae Brief: "Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amici Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of February 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
